backend.physics
Interface PiecePhysics

All Known Subinterfaces:
Ball, BallPhysics, Gizmo, GizmoPhysics, MobileGizmo, MobileGizmoPhysics, RotatableGizmo, RotatableGizmoPhysics, StaticGizmo, StaticGizmoPhysics
All Known Implementing Classes:
Absorber3D, Ball, Ball3D, CubicalBumper3D, Flipper3D, OuterWall3D, SphericalBumper3D, TriangularBumperA3D, Wall
public interface PiecePhysics

PiecePhysics - a piece of the gizmoball game - do not implement this class Use subinterfaces to get access to these methods

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar

getContainer

public javax.media.j3d.BoundingBox getContainer()
Gets the bounding box that surrounds the entire 3-dimensional piece in space. Bounding Box is in terms of absolute 3-dimensional space

Returns:
bounding box container of the 3-dimensional object

getLocation

public javax.vecmath.Point3d getLocation()
Returns the center of the piece in 3 dimensional space, must be the center of the piece

Returns:
a new 3 dimensional point of the absolute center position of this piece

getPhysicalComponents

public java.util.Set getPhysicalComponents()
Returnst the set of components built from the physics 3D package that account for how this piece should react to a physically-simulated environment

Returns:
read-only set of physics-3D components that make up the physical nature of this piece
